City Council Meeting Information:
=================================

City Council meetings are held every second Tuesday of the month beginning at 6:00 P.M. (unless otherwise noted; the meetings are conducted on a regular set schedule).

City Council meetings are held at the City of Carrizo Springs Conference Room, located at 308 W. Pena Street.

For more information, contact our City Clerk at 830-876-2476.

* [Email](https://www.cityofcarrizo.org/#email)
